entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this morning. 40 percent chance of flurries or ice pellets late this afternoon. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light this morning. Temperature steady near minus 2. Wind chill minus 8 this morning and minus 3 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow mixed with ice pellets. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries or ice pellets early this evening. Snow mixed with ice pellets beginning this evening. Snow and ice pellet amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 6 this evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 6. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the afternoon. Wind becoming northwest 20 late in the afternoon.
